title: rework evelyn
body: Riot Evelyn will receive rework of assassin ??

replies.body: She won't get a big rework during the assassin update,but she is rather high on the priority list,so she'll likely receive a VGU in the next year(for clarity,she is currently the 2nd most requested rework after Galio)

> [{quoted}](name=GreenLore,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Yd5mQzjv,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-09-12T14:24:23.869+0000)
>
> She won't get a big rework during the assassin update,but she is rather high on the priority list,so she'll likely receive a VGU in the next year(for clarity,she is currently the 2nd most requested rework after Galio)

wasn't WW first on the list

WW is going to be the next one,but that doesn't mean that he is the most requested.

They showed the list of the top 4 most requested reworks,shortly before yoricks release and it was:
1.Yorick(who got his rework already)
2.Galio(who is now in the works and since Yorick is now done,he is now the number 1)
3.Evelynn
4.Urgot

So yeah,WW isn't even in the current top 3,though he might have been higher on the request list at the time where he was chosen for the next rework.(or they just chose him because they still have data for him from a previous rework attempt)
WW and Galio are to be reworked very soon.

Rioters have talked pretty heavily recently about an Evelynn VGU, and the recent blurb article about her new lore is also indicative of a fairly soon VGU. I have money on her VGU happening when Warwick's team finishes him.
